main_definition: The GameCube is a video game console developed by Nintendo, released in 2001 as the successor to the Nintendo 64.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A popular gaming console from Nintendo
meanings_and_examples.example: I bought the GameCube when it was first released and played Super Smash Bros. Melee on it.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To deceive or trick someone in a game-like manner
meanings_and_examples.example: He tried to game the system by exploiting a loophole, but eventually got caught.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A casual or playful act done for enjoyment or amusement, similar to playing a video game
meanings_and_examples.example: We decided to have some fun and game around during our free time at the party.
